price: Indeed, your Lord is graceful to mankind[23], but most of them are ungrateful.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
footnotes: [23] As He delays their punishment and grants them respite to repent.
